articles.title: 5 arrested after 19-year-old killed in shooting at Mall of America - CBS News
articles.description: Five people are in custody -- including three juveniles -- after a 19-year-old man died in a shooting that prompted the Mall of America to go on lockdown Friday night.
articles.content:
BLOOMINGTON, Minn. -- Five people are in custody -- including three juveniles -- after a 19-year-old man died in a shooting that prompted the Mall of America to go on lockdown Friday night.

articles.title: Five arrested over deadly US mall shooting - 9News
articles.description: Five people have been arrested in the fatal shooting of a 19-year-old man at the Mall of America that sent the sprawling commercial centre into lockdown on one of the final days of the US holiday shopping season.
